name: Stupeflix SAS
description: Developer of mobile-based application designed to edit videos. The company's mobile-based application offers multimedia editing platform that allows to select video clips and combine them into a single film complete with transitions and music, enabling people and developers to make travel movies, wedding videos, promo ads and property virtual tours.
one_liner: Developer of mobile-based application designed to edit videos. The company's mobile-based application offers multimedia editing platform that allows to select video clips and combine them into a single film complete with transitions and music, enabling people and developers to make travel movies, wedding videos, promo ads and property virtual tours.
